department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide equipment and scaffold erecting services to Marine Atlantic Inc (MAI). The period for issuing Call-ups and providing services against the Standing Offer is for two years inclusive.
full_summary:
=================
### Government Tender Announcement: MA021-220134 Scaffolding Components

**Tender Reference:** WS3975274319-Doc4002674768
**Publication Date:** May 10, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** June 5, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
**Method of Procurement:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Contracting Entity:**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Objective**
Canada seeks offers from qualified suppliers to provide equipment and scaffold erecting services for Marine Atlantic Inc. (MAI) on a needs basis for two years inclusive. The Standing Offer may be extended for two additional periods of two years and one year each, if authorized.

**Scope of Work**
The services required include the provision of all scaffolding/staging equipment rentals for MAI. Suppliers must be capable of providing equipment setup and maintenance services as required.

**Key Requirements**
- Two years inclusive period for issuing Call-ups and providing services against the Standing Offer
- Optional extension of Standing Offer for two additional periods of two years and one year each
- Equipment setup and maintenance services as required
- Bidders must be able to provide a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation, if requested

**Tender Evaluation**
The Lowest Price selection criterion will be used to evaluate bids.

**Contact**
Melanie Gillis
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
melanie.gillis2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Tender Information**
The full Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) and attachments can be accessed and downloaded by registering on SAP Ariba and completing your Government of Canada profile.

Note: The contract will only be awarded to the Supplier who submits the lowest price that meets all the requirements specified in the procurement documents. 

Action Required
---------------

* Review the Request for Standing Offer and its attachments carefully before submitting a bid.
* Ensure that you have completed your Government of Canada profile and have a SAP Ariba account before accessing the tender documents.
* Confirm your understanding of the Security Requirement(s) for this solicitation.
* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation, if their bid is not selected for an award. A debriefing request must
